content:
hamirmahal opened issue #9064:

          Oh nice! If you'd like feel free to add this lint [here](https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/ba864e987ef1ab87c439ca6b396264547d2425e1/Cargo.toml#L174-L182) which would be a ratchet for the whole workspace. Probably not all of `pedantic` but this specific lint I think would be a reasonable candidate to add.

_Originally posted by @alexcrichton in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/9047#issuecomment-2263425790_
